title: Covid-19 Data Trends and Visual Insights
description: Created a dynamic dashboard using Power BI and Excel. Analyzed 6 months of initial covid-19 cases, identified key trends and insights, and performed dashboards and stories.

title: Comprehensive U.S Sales Performance Analysis
description: Developed an interactive Tableau dashboard. Analyzed profit/loss patterns and regional sales trends. Cleaned and preprocessed data using Tableau Prep, reducing processing time by 25%.

title: Retail Sales Analysis
description: Analyzed Australian fashion sales data to identify key purchasing patterns. Executed a dynamic multi-dashboard with hyperlinks, slicers, maps, sparklines, and charts. Summarized total sales for dynamic metric identification.
